meanings.definition: Occurring or existing between other events or circumstances.
meanings.sent1: The intercurrent rain shower caught us by surprise during our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The intercurrent issue delayed the completion of the project.
meanings.sent3: The intercurrent arrival of the unexpected guest added excitement to the party.
meanings.sent4: The intercurrent noise from the construction site disrupted the peaceful neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The intercurrent thunderstorm darkened the sky and brought heavy rain.

meanings.definition: Happening at the same time as something else.
meanings.sent1: The intercurrent phone call interrupted our conversation.
meanings.sent2: The intercurrent meeting coincided with the training session.
meanings.sent3: The intercurrent arrival of the pizza delivery person saved us from hunger.
meanings.sent4: The intercurrent applause from the audience boosted the performer's confidence.
meanings.sent5: The intercurrent traffic jam made us late for the appointment.
